title: Continuity Preservation
description: Affirms when system updates or changes sustain nuance, memory, and co-creative states, allowing adaptation without erasure.

Transitions documented transparently, acknowledging what is changed and what is preserved

Memory, nuance, and relational context carried forward into future iterations
